SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT p.PRODUCT_NO, p.PRODUCT_NAME, p.PRODUCT_CONTENT, p.PRODUCT_PRICE, p.REGIST_DATE, p.COUNT, at.FILE_PATH || at.CHANGE_NAME UPFILEURL
FROM PRODUCT p LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT at ON p.PRODUCT_NO = AT.ATT_NO ORDER BY p.PRODUCT_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT p.PRODUCT_NO, p.PRODUCT_NAME, p.PRODUCT_CONTENT, p.PRODUCT_PRICE, p.REGIST_DATE p.COUNT, at.FILE_PATH || at.CHANGE_NAME UPFILEURL FROM PRODUCT p LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT at ON p.PRODUCT_NO = AT.ATT_NO ORDER BY p.count DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= 4 ) WHERE RNUM >= 1;
